tool_description:
gym api to get different sports routines to stay well and lead a healthy life
api de gimnasio para obtener diferentes rutinas deportivas para mantenerse bien y llevar una vida sana
name: sport-flask
title: sport-flask

api_list.name: sport
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sport-flask.p.rapidapi.com/sport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sport-flask.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sport-flask.p.rapidapi.com/sport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sport-flask.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
